sentences.sContent: The house was surrounded by trees, and invisible from the road.
sentences.sCn: 这所房子树木环绕，从路上是看不见的。

sentences.sContent: ...But the invisible group wasn't far behind the high-risk set...
...The invisible hand of the market has often relied heavily on the visible hand of government...

synos.tran: 无形的，看不见的；无形的；不显眼的，暗藏的

remMethod.val: in(不) ＋ vis(看见) ＋ ible(…的) → 看不见的

words.tran: 看不见；看不见的东西；难看见

trans.tranOther: something that is invisible cannot be seen
